root.name: High Heat Major League Baseball 2003
root.description: This game receive a scathing review from Tommy Tallarico on the game review show Judgment Day. He stated that the audio was horrible, the character models looked bad, and the rosters and stats were actually off from the stats in the season it advertises. This is ironic because the stats are a big draw for the game's fans, as the stats in the game are extremely deep.
